casebody.data:
Second Department,

May, 1954.

(May 3, 1954.) Christopher E. Balestrero, Appellant, v. Prudential Insurance Company of America et al, Respondents.

Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals granted. The following question is certified: Was the order of this court, entered March 1, 1954, properly made? Present — Nolan, P. J., Adel, Wenzel, Beldock and Murphy, JJ. [See ante, p. 794.]
